title: 93/605/EC: Council Decision of 5 November 1993 on the conclusion of the Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters concerning the provisional application of the Protocol setting out the fishing opportunities and financial contribution provided for in the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Islamic Republic of Mauritania on fishing off the coast of Mauritania for the period 1 August 1993 to 31 July 1996
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 5 November 1993 on the conclusion of the Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters concerning the provisional application of the Protocol setting out the fishing opportunities and financial contribution provided for in  the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Islamic Republic of Mauritania on fishing off the coast of Mauritania for the period 1 August 1993 to 31 July 1996 (93/605/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters concerning the provisional application of the Protocol setting out the fishing opportunities and financial contribution provided for in the Agreement between the European Economic Community  and the Islamic Republic of Mauritania on fishing off the coast of Mauritania for the period 1 August 1993 to 31 July 1996 is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The texts of the Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters and of the Protocol are attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the persons empowered to sign the Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters in order to bind the Community.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 November 1993.
For the Council
The President
E. TOMAS
(1) OJ No L 388, 31. 12. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 117, 10. 5. 1991, p. 1.
